senses.sense_definition: The quality or state of existing in space or having spatial dimensions.

examples.text: The architect emphasized the <w>spatiality</w> of the building by using open floor plans and high ceilings.
Philosophers often discuss the concept of <w>spatiality</w> and how it relates to our perception of time.

senses.sense_definition: The specific arrangement or influence of position within a physical or social system.

examples.text: Urban planners study the <w>spatiality</w> of the city to understand how traffic flows through different neighborhoods.
The <w>spatiality</w> of the classroom arrangement significantly affects how students interact with one another.
